definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: examine, try (cf. Aram. [[בְּחַן]], Syr. bah.en, try, examine; Ar. mh.n I. VIII. test, cf. W:SG 65)—
examine, scrutinize, try Ps 11:5, Ps 139:23, Job 7:18; [[עַפְעַפָּיו יִבְחֲנוּ בְנֵי אָדָם]] His eyelids try the children of men (search them through and through) Ps 11:4.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: with the metaphor of gold Job 23:10; [[וּבְחַנְתִּים כִּבְחׂן]] [[אֶת־הַזׇּהָב]] and I will try them as one tries gold Zec 13:9.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: without metaphor, of God testing persons Ps 26:2, Ps 66:10, Ps 81:8, Je 9:6; their ways Je 6:27; the [[לֵב]] Ps 17:3, Je 12:3, Pr 17:3, 1Ch 29:17; reins Je 17:10; heart and reins Ps 7:10, Je 11:20 (= Je 20:12).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of man testing or tempting God Ps 95:9, Mal 3:10, Mal 3:15.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: the ear trying words Job 12:11 = Job 34:3.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יִבָּחֵן]] Job 34:36, Ge 42:15, Ge 42:16, to be tried, proved.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: [[בּׂחַן]] Ez Eze 21:18 the trial has been made (LXX SyrVer Vulgate Ges MV Ew Ke, but noun [[בּׂ֫חַן]] MT Symm Haev.; rd. [[בְּחֵן]] with grace, favour, Hi Co).
